title: 新约 - 约翰福音(John) - 第 17 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 约翰福音(John) -- 第 17 章 ( 本篇共有 21 章 )

lineList.en: These words spake Jesus, and lifted up his eyes to heaven, and said, Father, the hour is come; glorify thy Son, that thy Son also may glorify thee:
lineList.cn: 耶稣说了这话，就举目望天说，父阿，时候到了。愿你荣耀你的儿子，使儿子也荣耀你。

lineList.en: As thou hast given him power over all flesh, that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him.
lineList.cn: 正如你曾赐给他权柄，管理凡有血气的，叫他将永生赐给你所赐给他的人。

lineList.en: And this is life eternal, that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent.
lineList.cn: 认识你独一的真神，并且认识你所差来的耶稣基督，这就是永生。

lineList.en: I have glorified thee on the earth: I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do.
lineList.cn: 我在地上已经荣耀你，你所托付我的事，我已成全了。

lineList.en: And now, O Father, glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was.
lineList.cn: 父阿，现在求你使我同你享荣耀，就是未有世界以先，我同你所有的荣耀。

lineList.en: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world: thine they were, and thou gavest them me; and they have kept thy word.
lineList.cn: 你从世上赐给我的人，我已将你的名显明与他们。他们本是你的，你将他们赐给我，他们也遵守了你的道。

lineList.en: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee.
lineList.cn: 如今他们知道，凡你所赐给我的，都是从你那里来的。

lineList.en: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me; and they have received them, and have known surely that I came out from thee, and they have believed that thou didst send me.
lineList.cn: 因为你所赐给我的道，我已经赐给他们。他们也领受了，又确实知道，我是从你出来的，并且信你差了我来。

lineList.en: I pray for them: I pray not for the world, but for them which thou hast given me; for they are thine.
lineList.cn: 我为他们祈求。不为世人祈求，却为你所赐给我的人祈求，因他们本是你的。

lineList.en: And all mine are thine, and thine are mine; and I am glorified in them.
lineList.cn: 凡是我的都是你的，你的也是我的。并且我因他们得了荣耀。

lineList.en: And now I am no more in the world, but these are in the world, and I come to thee. Holy Father, keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me, that they may be one, as we are.
lineList.cn: 从今以后，我不在世上，他们却在世上，我往你那里去。圣父阿，求你因你所赐给我的名保守他们，叫他们合而为一，像我们一样。

lineList.en: While I was with them in the world, I kept them in thy name: those that thou gavest me I have kept, and none of them is lost, but the son of perdition; that the scripture might be fulfilled.
lineList.cn: 我与他们同在的时候，因你所赐给我的名，保守了他们，我也护卫了他们，其中除了那灭亡之子，没有一个灭亡的。好叫经上的话得应验。

lineList.en: And now come I to thee; and these things I speak in the world, that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves.
lineList.cn: 现在我往你们那里去。我还在世上说这话，是叫他们心里充满我的喜乐。

lineList.en: I have given them thy word; and the world hath hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
lineList.cn: 我已将你的道赐给他们。世界又恨他们，因为他们不属世界，正如我不属世界一样。

lineList.en: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil.
lineList.cn: 我不求你叫他们离开世界，只求你保守他们脱离

lineList.en: They are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
lineList.cn: 他们不属世界，正如我不属世界一样。

lineList.en: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.
lineList.cn: 求你用真理使他们成圣。你的道就是真理。

lineList.en: As thou hast sent me into the world, even so have I also sent them into the world.
lineList.cn: 你怎样差我到世上，我也照样差他们到世上。

lineList.en: And for their sakes I sanctify myself, that they also might be sanctified through the truth.
lineList.cn: 我为他们的缘故，自己分别为圣，叫他们也因真理成圣。

lineList.en: Neither pray I for these alone, but for them also which shall believe on me through their word;
lineList.cn: 我不但为这些人祈求，也为那些因他们的话信我的人祈求。

lineList.en: That they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee, that they also may be one in us: that the world may believe that thou hast sent me.
lineList.cn: 使他们都合而为一。正如你父在我里面，我在你里面，使他们也在我们里面。叫世人可以信你差了我来。

lineList.en: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them; that they may be one, even as we are one:
lineList.cn: 你赐给我的荣耀，我已经赐给他们，使他们合而为一，像我们合而为一。

lineList.en: I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me, and hast loved them, as thou hast loved me.
lineList.cn: 我在他们里面，你在我里面，使他们完完全全的合而为一。叫世人知道你差了我来，也知道你爱他们如同爱我一样。

lineList.en: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me: for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.
lineList.cn: 父阿，我在那里，愿你所赐给我的人也同我在那里，叫他们看见你所赐给我的荣耀。因为创立世界以前，你已经爱我了。

lineList.en: O righteous Father, the world hath not known thee: but I have known thee, and these have known that thou hast sent me.
lineList.cn: 公义的父阿，世人未曾认识你，我却认识你。这些人也知道你差了我来。

lineList.en: And I have declared unto them thy name, and will declare it: that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them, and I in them.
lineList.cn: 我已将你的名指示他们，还要指示他们，使你所爱我的爱在他们里面，我也在他们里面。
